Changelog
=========

1.0.3 (2013-07-17)
------------------

* Disabled handling in-line validation requests

1.0.2 (2013-01-16)
------------------

* PPP fixes

* Fixed Exception for python 2.4

* removed unused import

* Updated classifiers

* fixed ViewPageTemplateFile import

1.0.1 (2011-10-28)
------------------

* Fixed kss inline validation

1.0 (2010-04-29)
----------------

* Initial release
